generatedFromSchema_doNotEdit.title: Block Components Movable
generatedFromSchema_doNotEdit.description: This defines how a block reacts to being moved by another block like a piston.

fields.title: Movement Type
fields.description: How the block reacts to being pushed by another block like a piston. The options are: "push_pull" - The default value for this field. The block will be pushed and pulled by a piston. "push" - The block will only be pulled by a piston and will ignore a sticky piston. "popped" - The block is destroyed when moved by a piston. "immovable" - The block is unaffected by a piston.

fields.title: Sticky Type
fields.description: How the block should handle adjacent blocks around it when being pushed by another block like a piston. The options are: "same" - Adjacent blocks to this block will be moved when moved. This excludes other blocks with the "same" property. This will only work with the movement_type: "push_pull". "none" - The default and will not move adjacent blocks.
